citation.title: Cryptic transmission of SARS-CoV-2 in Washington State

news.title: SARS-CoV-2 Genomes Let Researchers Retrace Viral Spread, Mitigation Effects
news.summary: NEW YORK – From a purple dot in Wuhan, China, lines start to emerge, reaching the UK, Thailand, and Australia.

news.title: Coronavirus: aux États-Unis, l'épidémie est restée non détectée pendant plusieurs semaines
news.summary: CORONAVIRUS - Comment débute une épidémie? Alors que la baisse du nombre de nouveaux cas de coronavirus en France fait déjà place à la peur d’une deuxième vague qui ferait brusquement repartir la maladie, la question est plus que jamais d’actualité.

news.title: Early Detection of Covid-19 through a Citywide Pandemic Surveillance Platform
news.summary: To the Editor: Traditional approaches to respiratory virus surveillance may not identify novel pathogens in time to implement crucial public health interventions.

author.name: The New England Journal of Medicine

news.title: New analysis may rewrite the history of Washington state’s coronavirus outbreak
news.summary: By Seattle Times staff reporter A Snohomish County man who was the country’s first confirmed COVID-19 patient was probably not the source of the coronavirus outbreak in Washington state, according to a new genetic analysis by an international group…

news.title: The First Covid-19 Case In The US Did Not Spark The Wider Outbreak, New Analysis Suggests
news.summary: The first case of Covid-19 in the US might not have been the infection that sparked the outbreak that followed, according to a new analysis.

news.title: Genomic Analysis Indicates Multiple SARS-CoV-2 Introductions to Northern California
news.summary: NEW YORK – SARS-CoV-2 was introduced multiple times into Northern California, according to a genomic surveillance study.

news.title: COVID-19 got into Northern California several different ways
news.summary: COVID-19 was introduced multiple times into Northern California, according to a genomic surveillance study.

news.title: Bill Gates: We will have a coronavirus vaccine, but the disease will keep coming back if there's a US 'leadership vacuum'
news.summary: We talked to Bill Gates about the coronavirus vaccine race, why he's not in favor of a mask mandate, and what he thinks Joe Biden might do if elected.

news.title: Bill Gates: We will have a coronavirus vaccine, but the disease will keep coming back if there’s a US ‘leadership vacuum’
news.summary: Billionaire philanthropist Bill Gates has been warning about the threat of a pandemic for years.

news.title: Bill Gates: We will have a coronavirus vaccine, but the disease will keep coming back if there's a US 'leadership vacuum'
news.summary: "Slow." "Unfortunate." "Confused." "Worthless." When you hear Bill Gates talk about the US coronavirus response, his words don't carry the billionaire philanthropist's erstwhile optimistic tone.
